verse: So this is what the Lord All-Powerful says:

What person is wise enough to understand these things? Is there someone who has been taught by the Lord who can explain them? Why was the land ruined? Why has it been made like an empty desert where no one goes?
The Lord answered, “It is because Judah quit following my teachings that I gave them. They have not obeyed me or done what I told them to do.
Instead, they were stubborn and followed the Baals, as their ancestors taught them to do.
So this is what the Lord All-Powerful, the God of Israel, says: “I will soon make the people of Judah eat bitter food and drink poisoned water.
I will scatter them through other nations that they and their ancestors never knew about. I will chase the people of Judah with the sword until they are all killed.”
This is what the Lord All-Powerful says:
Say, “This is what the Lord says:
This is what the Lord says:
The Lord says, “The time is coming when I will punish all those who are circumcised only in the flesh:

the people of Egypt, Judah, Edom, Ammon, Moab, and the desert people who cut their hair short. The men in all those countries are not circumcised. And the whole family of Israel does not give itself to serving me.”
